descriptionHtml:
Bolgaar is Balgruuf's twin brother. He was exiled from Whiterun since he was 16 years. He grew up with forswon and now he's a freelance follower. You can find him at Old Hroldan, a little tavern near Markath (see photo of map).

*How to install with NMM: open program, go to add file, search Bolgraan The Exiled rar and click to open. Then, go to activate and have fun ^^.

*How to install manual: open Bolgraan The Exiled rar., put texture and meshes in texture and meshes data folder on main directory folder. Then put Bolgraan esp in data folder ... have fun ^^.

If you don't like this mod and want to delete files, just to go in main directory folder, looking for texture and mesh and in data folder.

- Compatability with other mods: Yes!
- NO other mods are required.

Mod required if you want him like my pics:
- Inhabitants of Skyrim - NPC Overhaul http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23755 (version 2)
- Nudes - FavoredSoulMeshes - ErectVersion http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488
- Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815

For any problem please let me a comment below the mod!
Thank you ;)
author: Nephae
